reviewText: Loved the movies, arrived in perfect condition
Great seller and ships fast. The movies are great also. Realy enjoyed them.
I like the three movies, good price and arrived on time

I am a huge fan of these movies.  They're very complex, and I would say, worth more than one viewing.  I'm a high school (primarily History and a Current Global Issues course) and I suggested these movies to a psychology teacher friend of mine.  She found them incredibly useful in her lesson plans, so I would recommend the same to any other psychology teacher out there.  But these aren't just educational movies, these are incredibly entertaining movies.  Great price, too!

I had seen these films on television some years ago with my mother.  They've always stuck with me and I'm glad I can finally own them on DVD.  And at a crazy affordable price!  If you haven't seen any of these I highly recommend them.  You'll be engaged the whole time and never know what to suspect.  Great to watch with friends and discuss.
